pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:1.3: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:1.4: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:1.5: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:1.8: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:1.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:1.11: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:2.1.6: sāmaṃ vā jānāti, aññe vā tassa ārocenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc62:2.1.7: “Sappāṇakan”ti jānanto, “paribhogena marissantī”ti jānanto paribhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
